item.description:
The last time BBLD dined at 604 Columbus Avenue, it was the address of Bob's Southern Bistro (a Boston institution) and it was their final meal before going out of business. It was one for the books....literally....we made it into a book of photos which captured a day in Boston. We also made it on the evening news as well as in the paper. To understand what I mean take a look here.

Darryl, who previously owned Bob's, has started another chapter at this address by opening Darryl's Corner Bar and Kitchen. It's located at the intersection of good friends, delicious food and great music.

Let's jazz up our Sunday in a laid-back atmosphere with a scrumptious Southern flavored comfort brunch while enjoying great live music. Here's the Brunch Buffet Menu

MBTA:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route. 

ten (10) minute walk from:

Ruggles Station - Orange Line

or

Mass Ave Station - Orange Line

five (5) minute walk from:

# 1 Mass Ave bus (Mass Ave and Columbus Street stop)

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Check out Google to plan your route.

PARKING:
There are spaces along Columbus Avenue and Mass Avenue.

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced. 
I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well, you have transportation issues, you don't have the money, or you just don't want to be around people. My only request is, you MUST let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me, you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.

Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than an hour from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call or text me at (617) 445-7549.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first seated basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO and WAIT LIST if meal is full. Maybe isn't an option.

If you RSVP YES or WAIT LIST, you MUST answer the question which appears after your RSVP. If you don't your RSVP will be changed to NO.

If brunch is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the brunch and you have not attended nor contacted me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update brunch confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW, each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within an hour of the brunch, it is counted as a NO-SHOW if you do not contact me.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events with reservations you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing the survey afterward.

I will arrive at 12:30 PM to welcome you outside.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: All You Can Eat Jazz Buffet Brunch
